trans-unit.source: Hosts an ActiveX control as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda um controle ActiveX como um elemento dentro do conteúdo do Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: Use the ActiveXHost class to host an ActiveX control as a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe ActiveXHost para hospedar um controle ActiveX como <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Currently, support is limited to windowed controls.
trans-unit.target: No momento, o suporte é limitado a controles de janela.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> window and assigns it to a parent.
trans-unit.target: Cria o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"> </xref> janela e atribui a um pai.

trans-unit.source: The parent window.
trans-unit.target: A janela pai.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> window.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> window.

trans-unit.source: Destroys the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: Destrói a janela hospedada.

trans-unit.source: A structure that contains the window handle.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o identificador de janela.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose*> method has been called on the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose*>método foi chamado o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"></xref> instance has been disposed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost"> </xref> instância tiver sido descartado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the window represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object, as requested by layout engine operations.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tamanho da janela representada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"> </xref> do objeto, conforme solicitado por operações de mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para quando uma chave de acesso que seja significativa para esse elemento é invocado.

trans-unit.source: The event data to the access key event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento para o evento de chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager"></xref> object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.
trans-unit.target: Os relatórios de dados de evento qual chave foi invocado e indicar se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager"> </xref> objeto que controla o envio desses eventos enviados também esta chamada de chave de acesso a outros elementos.

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Invocado sempre que o valor efetivo de qualquer propriedade de dependência sobre isso <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de dependência específicas alterada é relatada no parâmetro de argumentos.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged*>.
trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged*>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged*>

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento que descreve a propriedade alterada, bem como valores novos e antigos.

trans-unit.source: Called when the hosted window's position changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a posição da janela hospedado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The window's position.
trans-unit.target: A posição da janela.
